// Pivot 0, 0
int flipperright[20] = {
	20, 76,
	27, 76,
	98, 48,
	104, 40,
	104, 28,
	94, 22,
	86, 22,
	19, 60,
	15, 64,
	15, 70
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipperright[20] = {
	0.166667f, 0.760000f,
	0.225000f, 0.760000f,
	0.816667f, 0.480000f,
	0.866667f, 0.400000f,
	0.866667f, 0.280000f,
	0.783333f, 0.220000f,
	0.716667f, 0.220000f,
	0.158333f, 0.600000f,
	0.125000f, 0.640000f,
	0.125000f, 0.700000f
};
